document_data.name: Katherine Starlight
document_data.mainbody: '''Katherine Starlight''' was the innkeeper in the [[Evening Star Inn]] of [[Freedale]] in the [[Dalelands]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: She felt her husband spent too long staring at the stars.
document_data.Activities: Together with her husband, she ran the Evening Star Inn of Freedale; most of what she did was cooking and cleaning.
